name: jhonlaurens-portfolio
description: Portfolio profesional de Jhon Laurens - Data Engineer & AI Specialist

scripts.build: if exist public rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public && copy *.html public\ && xcopy assets public\assets /E /I /Q && xcopy forms public\forms /E /I /Q && echo Build complete!
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting HTML, CSS, and JS files...' && echo 'Lint complete!'

author: Jhon Laurens <jhonlaurens@gmail.com>
